mapper.select: SELECT t.`trade_type` tradeType, t.`mapping_type` mappingType FROM t_gq_fss_mapping t

SELECT t.`id` id, t.`cust_id` custId, t.`mapping_type` mappingType, t.`trade_type` tradeType, t.`create_time` createTime, t.`creater` creater, t.`modify_time` modifyTime, t.`updater` updater, t.`is_valid` isValid, t.`sort` sort, t.`remark` remark FROM t_gq_fss_mapping t WHERE t.mapping_type=#{mappingType} and t.is_valid=0 ORDER BY t.`sort` desc

SELECT t.`id` id, t.`cust_id` custId, t.`mapping_type` mappingType, t.`trade_type` tradeType, t.`create_time` createTime, t.`creater` creater, t.`modify_time` modifyTime, t.`updater` updater, t.`is_valid` isValid, t.`sort` sort, t.`remark` remark FROM t_gq_fss_mapping t WHERE t.`cust_id`=#{custId}

SELECT t.`id` id, t.`cust_id` custId, t.`mapping_type` mappingType, t.`trade_type` tradeType, t.`create_time` createTime, t.`creater` creater, t.`modify_time` modifyTime, t.`updater` updater, t.`is_valid` isValid, t.`sort` sort, t.`remark` remark FROM t_gq_fss_mapping t WHERE t.`sort`=#{sort}
